decision_conditions: The proposed non-material amendments to 224371FUL dated 13.09.2023 can be ACCEPTED as non-material amendments, in accordance with section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990), Government Guidance Greater flexibility for planning permissions (2010) and the Ealing Council Protocol for Non-Material Amendments following a grant of Planning Permission (2011).

site_name: Land Between Park View And Cloister Road
description: Application for a Non Material Amendment (S96a), for internal changes to building layout and alterations to fenestrations in relation to planning permission 224371FUL dated 13.09.2023 for 'Redevelopment of the Site including the erection of 6 residential buildings ranging in height from ground +1 to ground + 16 floors to provide a total of 300 new homes (use class C3) (affordable and private), with public and private amenity spaces including roof top gardens and play spaces; servicing; disabled car parking; bike and bin stores; resident gym; concierge and associated spaces. With associated highways works, and landscaping works along Western Avenue'
